heading: HB00213
0: AN ACT DECLARING MAY 15 OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NON-WORKING HOLIDAY IN THE ENTIRE PROVINCE OF SURIGAO DEL NORTE TO BE KNOWN AS "ADLAW NAN PROBINSYA NAN SURIGAO" AND REPEALING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7553, ENTITLED "AN ACT DECLARING JUNE NINETEEN OF EVERY YEAR AS SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE PROVINCE OF SURIGAO DEL NORTE, TO BE KNOWN AS "ADLAW NAN SURIGAO DEL NORTE"
